WorkItem.Description:
I just downloaded 'Irony_2013_09_03'  and it seem it is missing the files under: 
Irony\Parsing\_new\NewScanner (_parrialDefs.cs, NewScanner.cs, SourceSegments.cs and TerminalLookupByPrefix.cs), also GlrParser.cs at the same level of the NewScanner folder.

Am I the only one with this problem?

Thanks,

Armando

Comments.Message:
oh, shoot.. these are new, research/design phase things, they are not supposed to be there. Just delete the whole _new folder, it should compile without it.
Sorry for trouble, I will fix the zip asap

Indeed, I compared the vs2010 solution with the vs2012 and I noticed that the _new folder was not in there so I removed it and things look better. 

Thanks for the prompt reply!
